ComicInfo.Title: Inherit the Earth Part Five: Death At Depths; Talez of ZvR; The Orphan
ComicInfo.Summary:
In “Inherit the Earth,” an attack on the Amazon island expands the war beyond zombies and robots, with two planets at stake! And in “The Orphan,” a new friendship is torn asunder...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ashley Wood | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Mark Torres | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-06 18:30:01. [CVDB488691]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Characters: Ann Tran, Bot-Bot, Cesar Ortiz, Finola Moorpark, Fritz Winterbottom, Jenae Jefferson, Jukka Elfson, Minzy, Rosemary, Zeb Nova
